item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISProductName
item.description: This variable shows the name of the Avid NEXIS product line

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISVersion
item.description: This variable shows the version of the AvidNEXIS install

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISSystemDirectorState
item.description: This variable shows the state of the System Director. 0=Online, 1=Offline, 2=Standby, 3=Unknown

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISSystemDirectorStateString
item.description: This variable shows the state of the System Director in string format.

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISCheckEventLog
item.description: This variable shows whether the check event log flag is set.

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISWorkspaceRedistributingCount
item.description: This variable shows the current number of workspaces currently performing a redistribution.

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISMegabytesPerSecond
item.description: This variable shows total megabytes per second for all connected clients

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISReadMegabytesPerSecond
item.description: This variable shows total read megabytes per second for all connected clients

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISWriteMegabytesPerSecond
item.description: This variable shows total write megabytes per second for all connected clients

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISMessagesPerSecond
item.description: This variable shows the number of messages per second the system director is processing

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISOpenFiles
item.description: This variable shows how many open files are currently open

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISActiveClientCount
item.description: This variable shows the active client count

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISMaximumClientCount
item.description: This variable shows the maximum active client count

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISHighestDiskUsedPercentage
item.description: This variable shows the highest percent used across all disks

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISTotalSystemMB
item.description: This variable shows how total system megabytes

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISTotalAllocatedMB
item.description: This variable shows how total allocated megabytes. Allocated size is the sum of all the workspace sizes.

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISTotalUsedMB
item.description: This variable shows how total system usage across all workspaces

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISFileCount
item.description: This variable shows how total number of files across all workspaces

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISFolderCount
item.description: This variable shows the number of folders across all workspaces

item.name: AvidNEXIS-MIB::AvidNEXISWorkspaceCount
item.description: This variable shows how total number of workspaces
